overview: Aroldo Maciel, an audio technician at a university in Cuiabá, created an earthquake prediction method that has been challenging scientists around the world. He has great fame in Chile, to the point of not being able to walk the streets without being recognized. "Sísmico" shows great tremors predicted by Aroldo, his method, his conflict with science and his relationship with the Chileans.
title: Sísmico
